products.name: Arduino Uno
products.description: The Arduino Uno is a microcontroller board based on the ATmega328P.

products.name: Arduino Mega
products.description: The Arduino Mega 2560 is a microcontroller board based on the ATmega2560.

products.name: Arduino Nano
products.description: The Arduino Nano is a small, complete, and breadboard-friendly board based on the ATmega328P.

products.name: Arduino Due
products.description: The Arduino Due is a microcontroller board based on the Atmel SAM3X8E.

products.name: Arduino Pro Mini
products.description: The Arduino Pro Mini is a microcontroller board based on the ATmega328P.

products.name: Arduino Leonardo
products.description: The Arduino Leonardo is a microcontroller board based on the ATmega32u4.

products.name: Arduino Nano Every
products.description: The Arduino Nano Every is a small, robust, and powerful board with the same classic Nano footprint.

products.name: Arduino MKR WiFi 1010
products.description: The Arduino MKR WiFi 1010 is the easiest point of entry to basic IoT and pico-network application development.

products.name: Arduino MKR Vidor 4000
products.description: The Arduino MKR Vidor 4000 is highly configurable and powerful, and it can perform high-speed digital audio and video processing.

products.name: Arduino Nano 33 BLE
products.description: The Arduino Nano 33 BLE is a compact board based on the NINA B306 module.

products.name: Arduino Nano 33 IoT
products.description: The Arduino Nano 33 IoT is the easiest and cheapest point of entry to enhance existing devices.

products.name: Arduino MKR Zero
products.description: The Arduino MKR Zero is a compact board that is based on the Atmel SAMD21 and integrated with the ECC508 CryptoAuthentication chip.

products.name: Arduino MKR GSM 1400
products.description: The Arduino MKR GSM 1400 is a powerful board that combines the functionality of the Zero and global GSM connectivity.

products.name: Arduino MKR WAN 1300
products.description: The Arduino MKR WAN 1300 is a powerful board that combines the functionality of the MKR Zero and LoRa connectivity.

products.name: Arduino MKR NB 1500
products.description: The Arduino MKR NB 1500 is a powerful board that combines the functionality of the Zero and global 3G connectivity.

products.name: Arduino MKR 1000
products.description: The Arduino MKR 1000 is a powerful board that combines the functionality of the Zero and Wi-Fi connectivity.

products.name: Arduino MKR FOX 1200
products.description: The Arduino MKR FOX 1200 is a powerful board that combines the functionality of the Zero and Sigfox connectivity.

products.name: Arduino MKR WAN 1310
products.description: The Arduino MKR WAN 1310 is a powerful board that combines the functionality of the MKR Zero and LoRa connectivity.

products.name: Arduino MKR WiFi 1000
products.description: The Arduino MKR WiFi 1000 is a powerful board that combines the functionality of the Zero and Wi-Fi connectivity.

products.name: Arduino MKR GSM 1200
products.description: The Arduino MKR GSM 1200 is a powerful board that combines the functionality of the Zero and global GSM connectivity.
